text: ونفخ فى الصور ذلك يوم الوعيد

translations.translation: The Trumpet will be blown. That is the Day of the Threat.
And the trumpet blast will sound: It would be the Day of Doom.
And then the Trumpet was blown. This is the day of the promised chastisement.
The trumpet will certainly be sounded. This will be the day (about which you) were threatened.
And the Trumpet was blown; “This is the Day of the promised punishment.”
And the Trumpet will be blown -- that will be the Day of the threat.
And the trumpet shall be blown; that is the day of the threatening.
And the Trumpet shall be blown; that is the Day of the Threat.
And the trumpet is blown. This is the threatened Day.
The trumpet will be sounded. This is the Day [you were] warned of.
And the trumpet will be blown: this is the Day of the Threatening.
And the Trumpet will be blown: ‘This is the promised day.’
And the Trumpet shall be blown: that will be the Day whereof Warning (had been given).
And the Trumpet will be blown, that will be the Day whereof warning (had been given) (i.e. the Day of Resurrection).
And the Horn shall be blown; that is the Day of Threat!
And the Trumpet is blown: “This is the Promised Day.”
And the Horn will be blown. That is the Day of [carrying out] the threat.
[50:20] And the Trumpet will be blown, for resurrection. That, namely, the day of the blast, is the Day of the Promised Threat, of chastisement for the disbelievers.
(And the trumpet is blown) this is the blowing of the resurrection. (This is the threatened Day) the threatened Day of the first and latter nations.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَ } بعدما ذاق مرارة العذاب وقت سكرات الموت { نُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ } للبعث والحشر، فإذا هو حينئذٍ قائم، هائم ينظر، قيل له من قبل الحق على سبيل التهويل: ألست تنظر وتتحير يا مسكين؟! { ذَلِكَ } اليوم الذي أنت فيه الآن { يَوْمُ ٱلْوَعِيدِ } [ق: 20] الموعود لك في دار الدنيا، وأنت حينئذ لم تؤمن به ولم تخف من أهواله حتى وقعت فيه، وذقت من عذابه

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: { ونُفخ في الصور } نفخة العبث { ذلك يومُ الوعيد } أي: وقت ذلك النفخ هو يوم الوعيد، أي: يوم إنجاز الوعد ووقوع الوعيد
